item.title: Jen add a quote by Jerry Garcia
item.description: "What a long strange trip it's been." -- Jerry Garcia

item.title: Jen add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Jen add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious - the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jen add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jen add a quote by Garth Stein
item.description:
"Here is why I will be a good person. Because I listen. I cannot speak so I listen very well. I never interrupt, I never deflect the course of the conversation with a comment of my own.
...I beg of you, pretend you are a dog like me and LISTEN to other people rather than steal their stories." -- Garth Stein

item.title: Jen add a quote by Laura Greenwald
item.description: "The perfect human being is uninteresting. â€” Joseph Campbell" -- Laura Greenwald
